vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Mal.1.1
§ Malachi = "My messenger"
the prophet who wrote the last book of the Old Testament; nothing else is known
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪拉基 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "神的報信者"
寫舊約聖經最後一卷書的先知; 其他不詳
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛拉基 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "神的报信者"
写旧约圣经最后一卷书的先知; 其他不详
